abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that Duane Reade drugstore in Manhattan's Port Authority Bus Terminal is plagued with shoplifters, who routinely attempt to steal items like tampons, beer and cosmetics; says store is easy target for shoplifters, most of whom when caught are not reported to police.

headline.print_headline: Stakeouts by the Cooler at a Bus Terminal’s Den of Thieves
headline.main: Stakeouts, by the Cooler, at a Bus Terminal’s Den of Thieves

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: At a drugstore in a Manhattan transit hub, undercover guards say they face an onslaught of shoplifters with an appetite for cosmetics, condoms and alcohol.
lead_paragraph: At a drugstore in a Manhattan transit hub, undercover guards say they face an onslaught of shoplifters with an appetite for cosmetics, condoms and alcohol.
